com.lambda.entity
Class EntityHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.lambda.entity.EntityHandler

public class EntityHandler
extends java.lang.Object

The 'EntityHandler' handles all 'Entities' in the actual context. It's easily possible to manage 'Entities' using this class.

Author:
alex

Field Summary
protected  java.util.ArrayList<Entity> entityList
          Stores all entities the 'EntityHandler' manages.
protected  java.util.ArrayList<Entity> zombieList
          Contains 'Entities' that have been removed from the list of active entities, and are waiting for final removal.
 
Constructor Summary
EntityHandler()
          Creates a new 'EntityHandler' object and initializes all needed values.
 
Method Summary
 void dump()
          Prints a String representation of all 'Entities' in the 'EntityHandler' to the console.
 java.util.ArrayList<Entity> getAll()
          Gives back the list of 'Entities' managed by this 'EntityHandler'.
 Entity getEntity(long id)
          Gives back the Entity with the Identifier id.
static long getNextAvailableID(java.util.ArrayList<Entity> list)
          Gives the next ID that has not already been used in the List list.
 void registerEntity(Entity e)
          Registers an 'Entity' in the 'EntityHandler'.
static void registerEntityHandler(EntityHandler eh)
          Sets the 'EntityHandler' 'eh' as the current 'EntityHandler' for 'Entities'.
 void removeAll()
          Removes all 'Entities' from the 'EntityHandler'.
 void removeEntity(Entity e)
          Removes an 'Entity' from the context of the 'EntityHandler'.
 void removeEntity(long id)
          Removes an 'Entity' from the context of the 'EntityHandler'.
 void render()
          Calls the 'render'-method for every 'Entity' the 'EntityHandler' manages.
 void update(int delta)
          Calls the 'update'-method for every 'Entity' the 'EntityHandler' manages.

getEntity

public Entity getEntity(long id)
Gives back the Entity with the Identifier id.

Parameters:
id - The ID the 'Entity' has.
Returns:
The corresponding 'Entity' or 'null' upon failure.

getAll

public java.util.ArrayList<Entity> getAll()
Gives back the list of 'Entities' managed by this 'EntityHandler'.

Returns:
An ArrayList of 'Entities' containing every 'Entity' handled by the 'EntityHandler'.

removeEntity

Removes an 'Entity' from the context of the 'EntityHandler'.

Parameters:
e - The 'Entity' that has to be removed.

Removes an 'Entity' from the context of the 'EntityHandler'.

Parameters:
id - The ID of the 'Entity' that has to be removed.

removeAll

public void removeAll()
Removes all 'Entities' from the 'EntityHandler'.

Calls the 'render'-method for every 'Entity' the 'EntityHandler' manages.
